item.title: Emoji data in MySQL
item.description: Supported MySQL 5.5, 5.6. First, MySQL should set DB and table to utf8mb4. utf8 - 3 byte characters utf8mb4 - 4 byte characters ALTER DATABASE my_database DEFAULT CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_general_ci; ALTER TABLE my_table DEFAULT CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci; ALTER TABLE my_column CHANGE my_column my_column TEXT CHARACTER SET utf8mb4 COLLATE utf8mb4_unicode_ci NOT NULL; Then, when inserting data or selecting data, execute this statement first: --Execute this statement first SET NAMES utf8mb4; --then insert or select SELECT * FROM my_table
